name: 💀 Sprite Game 💀
description:
💀 Sprite Game 💀

Do you have what it takes to escape... the Sprite Game?  (The Celebration Chamber is a Lie.)

Includes full voice narration and a surprise ending.

A manic, head-exploding, revenge-taking squid-like game created for GOTM.IO Jam #10

- 30 Competitors
- 3 Death Matches
- 1 Winner

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD, plus space/enter for special actions.  Also supports joystick and touch controls.

Design - Anthony Gill
Voice Acting - Emily Galarneau
Music - Dark Fantasy Studio
Art - kenney.nl
